1.0.0.name: wordpress/easystrings-for-thecartpress-ecommerce
1.0.0.description:
Languages Easy Strings is a plugin for WordPress. It allows to change small texts in your sites. For example, to change the buy button title, you can change "Add to Cart" by "Buy now".

More info and Community

  • TheCartPress Extend: plugins, themes and custom development
  • TheCartPress Demo
  • TheCartPress Community/Support
  • TheCartPress Site
